name: Kila's Darker Abyss + Kila's Dark Abyss RE-RUN
name_original: Kila's Darker Abyss + Kila's Dark Abyss RE-RUN
description:
The abyss beckons you.

This is a mashup of a sequel (Kila's Darker Abyss), and a remake (Kila's Dark Abyss RE-RUN) of my Five Nights at Freddy's fangame, Kila's Dark Abyss.
